QuestData.Title: A Matter of Life and Death
QuestData.Description: Stranger, please help me!$B$BMy companions and I ventured here to seek the bounty on a monstrous wasp queen.$B$BAfter we set up camp down the hill, we fell asleep. We were attacked in the middle of the night by these horrid, pale... things!$B$BI don't know where my friends have gone, but I heard screams from further down the cavern.$B$BPlease, find my companions. I can't leave here without them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Arekk, Diaani, and Zuulo in Bloodthorn Cave.
QuestData.CompletionText: They told us not to come out here, but we didn't listen. Why didn't we listen!?
QuestData.RewardText: My prayers have been answered, hero. I will tell everyone back at the village of your deeds.
